curam.util.ieg.intf
Interface IEGEditingAPI

All Known Implementing Classes:
curam.util.ieg.base.IEGEditingAPI
Direct Known Subclasses:
IEGEditingAPIFactory
public class IEGEditingAPI
extends curam.util.ieg.base.IEGEditingAPI

Provides methods for manipulating scripts.

listQuestionsForScript

public QuestionDetailsList listQuestionsForScript(QuestionScriptByID questionScriptID)
                                           throws AppException,
                                                  InformationalException
Returns a list of all the questions contained in a particular script.

Parameters:
questionScriptID - contains the ID of the script for which the questions will be returned.
Returns:
QuestionDetailsList A list of questionDetails.
Throws:
AppException - ID_EMPTY_ID - if id is empty
AppException - If error occurs.
InformationalException - If error occurs.

listQuestionAliases

public QuestionAliasDetailsList listQuestionAliases(QuestionAliasesByLocale questionAliasesByLocale)
                                             throws AppException,
                                                    InformationalException
Returns a list of question aliases for a given locale.

Parameters:
questionAliasesByLocale - the group ID, question ID and locale.
Returns:
QuestionAliasDetailsList the list of QuestionAliasDetails.
Throws:
AppException - ID_INVALID_TRANSLATION - if the locale is not found
AppException - ID_UNKNOWN_QUESTION_GROUP - if the question group is not found
AppException - ID_QUESTION_NOT_DEFINED if the question is not found
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

deepDelete

public void deepDelete(QuestionScriptByID questionScriptByID)
                throws AppException,
                       InformationalException
Deep Delete a script. Remove the script and all its associated Question Groups providing none of the Question Groups have relationships with other scripts or the script is not a subscript of any other script.

Parameters:
questionScriptByID - Question script by ID.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
